verses.verse: Therefore <WG1352> thou art <WG1488> inexcusable, <WG379> O <WG5599> man, <WG444> whosoever <WG3956> thou art that judgest: <WG2919> for <WG1063> wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> thou judgest <WG2919> another, <WG2087> thou condemnest <WG2632> thyself; <WG4572> for <WG1063> thou that judgest <WG2919> doest <WG4238> the <WG3588> same things. <WG846>

But <WG1161> we are sure <WG1492> that <WG3754> the <WG3588> judgment <WG2917> of God <WG2316> is <WG2076> according <WG2596> to truth <WG225> against <WG1909> them which commit <WG4238> such things. <WG5108>

And <WG1161> thinkest <WG3049> thou this, <WG5124> O <WG5599> man, <WG444> that judgest <WG2919> them which do <WG4238> such things, <WG5108> and <WG2532> doest <WG4160> the same, <WG846> that <WG3754> thou <WG4771> shalt escape <WG1628> the <WG3588> judgment <WG2917> of God? <WG2316>

Or <WG2228> despisest <WG2706> thou the <WG3588> riches <WG4149> of his <WG848> goodness <WG5544> and <WG2532> forbearance <WG463> and <WG2532> longsuffering; <WG3115> not knowing <WG50> that <WG3754> the <WG3588> goodness <WG5543> of God <WG2316> leadeth <WG71> thee <WG4571> to <WG1519> repentance? <WG3341>

But <WG1161> after <WG2596> thy <WG4675> hardness <WG4643> and <WG2532> impenitent <WG279> heart <WG2588> treasurest up <WG2343> unto thyself <WG4572> wrath <WG3709> against <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of wrath <WG3709> and <WG2532> revelation <WG602> of the righteous judgment <WG1341> of God; <WG2316>
Who <WG3739> will render <WG591> to every man <WG1538> according <WG2596> to his <WG846> deeds: <WG2041>

To them who <WG3303> by <WG2596> patient continuance <WG5281> in well <WG18> doing <WG2041> seek for <WG2212> glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honor <WG5092> and <WG2532> immortality, <WG861> eternal <WG166> life: <WG2222>

But <WG1161> unto them that are contentious, <WG1537> <WG2052> and <WG2532> do not obey <WG544> <WG3303> the <WG3588> truth, <WG225> but <WG1161> obey <WG3982> unrighteousness, <WG93> indignation <WG2372> and <WG2532> wrath, <WG3709>

Tribulation <WG2347> and <WG2532> anguish, <WG4730> upon <WG1909> every <WG3956> soul <WG5590> of man <WG444> that doeth <WG2716> evil, <WG2556> of the <WG5037> Jew <WG2453> first, <WG4412> and <WG2532> also of the Gentile; <WG1672>

But <WG1161> glory, <WG1391> honor, <WG5092> and <WG2532> peace, <WG1515> to every man <WG3956> that worketh <WG2038> good, <WG18> to the <WG5037> Jew <WG2453> first, <WG4412> and <WG2532> also to the Gentile: <WG1672>
For <WG1063> there is <WG2076> no <WG3756> respect of persons <WG4382> with <WG3844> God. <WG2316>

For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> have sinned <WG264> without law <WG460> shall also <WG2532> perish <WG622> without law: <WG460> and <WG2532> as many as <WG3745> have sinned <WG264> in <WG1722> the law <WG3551> shall be judged <WG2919> by <WG1223> the law; <WG3551>

(For <WG1063> not <WG3756> the <WG3588> hearers <WG202> of the <WG3588> law <WG3551> are just <WG1342> before <WG3844> God, <WG2316> but <WG235> the <WG3588> doers <WG4163> of the <WG3588> law <WG3551> shall be justified. <WG1344>

For <WG1063> when <WG3752> the Gentiles, <WG1484> which have <WG2192> not <WG3361> the law, <WG3551> do <WG4160> by nature <WG5449> the things <WG3588> contained in the <WG3588> law, <WG3551> these, <WG3778> having <WG2192> not <WG3361> the law, <WG3551> are <WG1526> a law <WG3551> unto themselves: <WG1438>

Which <WG3748> show <WG1731> the <WG3588> work <WG2041> of the <WG3588> law <WG3551> written <WG1123> in <WG1722> their <WG848> hearts, <WG2588> their <WG848> conscience <WG4893> also bearing witness, <WG4828> and <WG2532> their thoughts <WG3053> the mean while <WG3342> accusing <WG2723> or <WG2228> else <WG2532> excusing <WG626> one another;) <WG240>

In <WG1722> the day <WG2250> when <WG3753> God <WG2316> shall judge <WG2919> the <WG3588> secrets <WG2927> of men <WG444> by <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> according <WG2596> to my <WG3450> gospel. <WG2098>
Behold, <WG2396> thou <WG4771> art called <WG2028> a Jew, <WG2453> and <WG2532> restest in <WG1879> the <WG3588> law, <WG3551> and <WG2532> makest thy boast <WG2744> of <WG1722> God, <WG2316>
And <WG2532> knowest <WG1097> his will, <WG2307> and <WG2532> approvest <WG1381> the things that are more excellent, <WG1308> being instructed <WG2727> out of <WG1537> the <WG3588> law; <WG3551>
And <WG5037> art confident <WG3982> that thou thyself <WG4572> art <WG1511> a guide <WG3595> of the blind, <WG5185> a light <WG5457> of them <WG3588> which are in <WG1722> darkness, <WG4655>

An instructor <WG3810> of the foolish, <WG878> a teacher <WG1320> of babes, <WG3516> which hast <WG2192> the <WG3588> form <WG3446> of knowledge <WG1108> and <WG2532> of the <WG3588> truth <WG225> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> law. <WG3551>

Thou therefore which teachest <WG1321> <WG3767> another, <WG2087> teachest <WG1321> thou not <WG3756> thyself? <WG4572> thou that preachest <WG2784> a man should not <WG3361> steal, <WG2813> dost thou steal? <WG2813>
Thou that sayest <WG3004> a man should not <WG3361> commit adultery, <WG3431> dost thou commit adultery? <WG3431> thou that abhorrest <WG948> idols, <WG1497> dost thou commit sacrilege? <WG2416>
Thou that <WG3739> makest thy boast <WG2744> of <WG1722> the law, <WG3551> through <WG1223> breaking <WG3847> the <WG3588> law <WG3551> dishonorest <WG818> thou God? <WG2316>
For <WG1063> the <WG3588> name <WG3686> of God <WG2316> is blasphemed <WG987> among <WG1722> the <WG3588> Gentiles <WG1484> through <WG1223> you, <WG5209> as <WG2531> it is written. <WG1125>

For <WG1063> circumcision <WG4061> verily <WG3303> profiteth, <WG5623> if <WG1437> thou keep <WG4238> the law: <WG3551> but <WG1161> if <WG1437> thou be a breaker <WG3848> of the law, <WG3551> thy <WG4675> circumcision <WG4061> is made <WG1096> uncircumcision. <WG203>

Therefore <WG3767> if <WG1437> the <WG3588> uncircumcision <WG203> keep <WG5442> the <WG3588> righteousness <WG1345> of the <WG3588> law, <WG3551> shall not <WG3780> his <WG848> uncircumcision <WG203> be counted <WG3049> for <WG1519> circumcision? <WG4061>

And <WG2532> shall not uncircumcision <WG203> which is by <WG1537> nature, <WG5449> if it fulfill <WG5055> the <WG3588> law, <WG3551> judge <WG2919> thee, <WG4571> who by <WG1223> the letter <WG1121> and <WG2532> circumcision <WG4061> dost transgress <WG3848> the law? <WG3551>

For <WG1063> he is <WG2076> not <WG3756> a Jew, <WG2453> which is one outwardly; <WG1722> <WG5318> neither <WG3761> is that circumcision, <WG4061> which is outward <WG1722> <WG5318> in <WG1722> the flesh: <WG4561>

But <WG235> he is a Jew, <WG2453> which is one inwardly; <WG1722> <WG2927> and <WG2532> circumcision <WG4061> is that of the heart, <WG2588> in <WG1722> the spirit, <WG4151> and not <WG3756> in the letter; <WG1121> whose <WG3739> praise <WG1868> is not <WG3756> of <WG1537> men, <WG444> but <WG235> of <WG1537> God. <WG2316>
